text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    126361000119107Cytological evidence of malignancy on anal Papanicolaou smear (finding)
    126371000119101Cytological evidence of malignancy on vaginal Papanicolaou smear (finding)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    CodeDisplay
    R85.614Cytologic evidence of malignancy on smear of anus
    R87.624Cytologic evidence of malignancy on smear of vagina

name: CytologicEvidenceOfMalignancyVS
title: Cytologic Evidence of Malignancy Value Set
description: Types of cytological evidence of malignancy, coded in SNOMED CT or ICD-10-CM.
